articles.title: Nvidia forecasts decelerating growth after two-year AI boom
articles.summary: Nvidia Corp., the world's most valuable company, gave a tepid revenue forecast for the current period, signaling that growth is decelerating after a staggering two-year boom in artificial intelligence spending.
articles.translated_title: Nvidia forecasts decelerating growth after two-year AI boom
articles.translated_summary: Nvidia Corp., the world's most valuable company, gave a tepid revenue forecast for the current period, signaling that growth is decelerating after a staggering two-year boom in artificial intelligence spending.

articles.title: The high price of regulating AI
articles.summary: The politics of artificial intelligence are quickly becoming a contest over regulation instead of enabling innovation.
articles.translated_title: The high price of regulating AI
articles.translated_summary: The politics of artificial intelligence are quickly becoming a contest over regulation instead of enabling innovation.

articles.title: China AI Chip Leader Warns of Trading Risks After Stock Frenzy
articles.summary: Chinese artificial intelligence chipmaker Cambricon Technologies Corp. issued a warning to investors about elevated trading risks after its shares more than doubled in one month.
articles.translated_title: China AI Chip Leader Warns of Trading Risks After Stock Frenzy
articles.translated_summary: Chinese artificial intelligence chipmaker Cambricon Technologies Corp. issued a warning to investors about elevated trading risks after its shares more than doubled in one month.

articles.title: US second-quarter GDP revised higher; weekly jobless claims fall
articles.summary: The U.S. economy grew faster than initially thought in the second quarter, in part driven by business investment in intellectual property such as artificial intelligence, but tariffs on imports continued to cloud the outlook.
articles.translated_title: US second-quarter GDP revised higher; weekly jobless claims fall
articles.translated_summary: The U.S. economy grew faster than initially thought in the second quarter, in part driven by business investment in intellectual property such as artificial intelligence, but tariffs on imports continued to cloud the outlook.

articles.title: Creative Human Programming Is King, Bain Report Says
articles.summary: An AI report by Bain says there is a flood of cheap artificial intelligence content but premium, human created content remains king.
articles.translated_title: Creative Human Programming Is King, Bain Report Says
articles.translated_summary: An AI report by Bain says there is a flood of cheap artificial intelligence content but premium, human created content remains king.

articles.title: Will Smith accused of using AI to create crowd footage in video
articles.summary: Will Smith's video featuring song "You Can Make It" sparks controversy as viewers notice alleged artificial intelligence-generated crowd scenes with distorted fan images.
articles.translated_title: Will Smith accused of using AI to create crowd footage in video
articles.translated_summary: Will Smith's video featuring song "You Can Make It" sparks controversy as viewers notice alleged artificial intelligence-generated crowd scenes with distorted fan images.

articles.title: Best Buy beats quarterly estimates on stable demand for gadgets
articles.summary: Best Buy topped Wall Street estimates for second-quarter sales and profit on Thursday, driven by strong online sales and a surge in demand for artificial intelligence-powered computers, mobile phones and other devices.
articles.translated_title: Best Buy beats quarterly estimates on stable demand for gadgets
articles.translated_summary: Best Buy topped Wall Street estimates for second-quarter sales and profit on Thursday, driven by strong online sales and a surge in demand for artificial intelligence-powered computers, mobile phones and other devices.

articles.title: Best Buy tops quarterly estimates on Nintendo Switch sales, AI tech demand
articles.summary: Best Buy topped Wall Street estimates for second-quarter results on Thursday, driven by strong sales of Nintendo Switch gaming consoles and a surge in demand for artificial intelligence-powered computers and mobile phones.
articles.translated_title: Best Buy tops quarterly estimates on Nintendo Switch sales, AI tech demand
articles.translated_summary: Best Buy topped Wall Street estimates for second-quarter results on Thursday, driven by strong sales of Nintendo Switch gaming consoles and a surge in demand for artificial intelligence-powered computers and mobile phones.

articles.title: Best Buy beats quarterly sales estimates on stable demand
articles.summary: Best Buy posted a surprise rise in second-quarter sales on Thursday, driven by strong online sales and a surge in demand for artificial intelligence-powered computers, mobile phones and other devices.
articles.translated_title: Best Buy beats quarterly sales estimates on stable demand
articles.translated_summary: Best Buy posted a surprise rise in second-quarter sales on Thursday, driven by strong online sales and a surge in demand for artificial intelligence-powered computers, mobile phones and other devices.

articles.title: Volkswagen extends Amazon cloud partnership to save costs with AI
articles.summary: Volkswagen has extended its 'factory cloud' partnership with Amazon Web Services by another five years, the German carmaker said on Thursday, as it rolls out the use of artificial intelligence to improve production and reduce costs.
articles.translated_title: Volkswagen extends Amazon cloud partnership to save costs with AI
